original_text: But thou must eat them before the Lord thy God in the place which the Lord thy God shall choose, thou, and thy son, and thy daughter, and thy manservant, and thy maidservant, and the Levite that is within thy gates: and thou shalt rejoice before the Lord thy God in all that thou puttest thine hands unto.
korean_text: 오직 네 하나님 여호와께서 택하실 곳에서 네 하나님 여호와 앞에서 너는 네 자녀와 노비와 성중에 거주하는 레위인과 함께 그것을 먹고 또 네 손으로 수고한 모든 일로 말미암아 네 하나님 여호와 앞에서 즐거워하되

sentences.original_text: But thou must eat them before the Lord thy God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 네 하나님 여호와 앞에서 그것을 먹어야 하니라

sentences.original_text: in the place which the Lord thy God shall choose
thou, and thy son, and thy daughter
and thy manservant, and thy maidservant
and the Levite that is within thy gates:
and thou shalt rejoice before the Lord thy God
in all that thou puttest thine hands unto.
